description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Vital Beacon]

Once per round, either you or an ally can use an Interact action to supplicate and lay hands upon you to regain Hit Points. It restores @Damage[(@item.level)d10[healing,vitality]|shortLabel] Hit Points to the first creature, @Damage[(@item.level)d8[healing,vitality]|shortLabel] Hit Points to the second, @Damage[(@item.level)d6[healing,vitality]|shortLabel] Hit Points to the third, and @Damage[(@item.level)d4[healing,vitality]|shortLabel] Hit Points to the fourth, after which the spell ends.
